entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
